Experience Our Demo

Curious how it works? Simply scan the demo tattoo featured on our website and listen as the embedded soundwave transforms into audible magic. This immersive experience highlights how InkStory brings your most cherished memories to life, offering a novel way to connect with your past.

Unleash Your Inspiration!
Frequently Asked Questions

InkStory works by seamlessly matching the tattoo on your skin with the pre-uploaded image. If the images match successfully, the app unleashes the sound you attached to the image, creating a captivating audio experience. This unique functionality allows you to fine-tune and adjust the image if needed, ensuring a perfect match between your tattoo and the original picture you created.

InkStory supports up to 3 tattoos for each user. If you have a single tattoo that is large in size, you can upload different parts of the tattoo and assign the same sound to each section. This unique feature allows you to scan any part of your tattoo and unlock the sound of the entire design, providing a cohesive audio experience that encompasses the entirety of your artwork.

Definitely! We encourage you to bring new meaning to your existing tattoos by adding them to InkStory. The process is simple: just upload a photo of your tattoo and attach the desired sound. No special actions are required – it's as easy as before, allowing you to enhance your existing tattoos with a captivating audio element. Let your tattoos come alive with the power of sound using InkStory.

You can add sound to any tattoo, regardless of its shape or design. Whether it's a portrait of a loved one, a stunning piece of art, or a unique composition, you have the freedom to attach sound to any tattoo that holds meaning to you. InkStory embraces the diversity of tattoo shapes and allows you to create an audio experience that complements your individual style and personal expression.

We prioritize the privacy and security of your personal information. All your audio files and associated photos are securely stored within the InkStory app. You can have peace of mind knowing that your data is kept confidential and protected from unauthorized access. We take privacy seriously, ensuring that your data remains safe and secure on your device.

We have an exciting roadmap ahead for InkStory! In the next release, we will introduce the ability to add videos, expanding the possibilities beyond just sound. Additionally, we have plans to incorporate various animations for your personal skin art projects, including augmented reality experiences. Our team is continuously working on innovative and exciting features to enhance your InkStory journey. Stay tuned for more thrilling updates coming soon!

We understand that circumstances may change, and you might need to delete your profile. To proceed with this request, please reach out to our dedicated support team via email at instory.care@gmail.com. Our team will be happy to assist you with this process and ensure your request is handled promptly and efficiently.
